forecast.name: Today
forecast.snowAmount: New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible
forecast.detailedForecast: A chance of rain showers between 8am and 9am, then a chance of snow showers between 9am and 11am, then a chance of rain and snow showers. Partly sunny. High near 46, with temperatures falling to around 35 in the afternoon. West wind 7 to 18 mph, with gusts as high as 33 mph. Chance of precipitation is 40%. New snow accumulation of less than half an inch possible.

nubsNob.xcTrails: Closed for the season due to many down trees.
nubsNob.comments: Today is the last day of skiing and snowboarding at Nub's Nob for the 2024-25 season. The conditions are very good this morning. The snow should get very soft by the afternoon as the temperature goes above freezing. Lift tickets are $25 for our last day of the season. Bring your sunglasses today. The lifts will spin from 9 AM to 4:30 PM. Thank you for an awesome season and make it a great day at Nub's Nob.
